# VisionDrive - Complete Information for LLMs

> VisionDrive Technologies FZ-LLC is a UAE-based IoT company specializing in smart kitchen temperature monitoring for commercial kitchens. The company helps food service businesses maintain food safety compliance with Dubai Municipality standards through intelligent IoT monitoring.

## Company Information

- Legal Name: VisionDrive Technologies FZ-LLC
- Website: https://visiondrive.ae
- Industry: IoT / Food Safety Technology
- Founded: UAE
- Jurisdiction: Ras Al Khaimah Free Zone, United Arab Emirates
- Office: Compass Coworking Centre, Ras Al Khaimah, UAE
- Email: tech@visiondrive.ae
- Phone: +971 55 915 2985
- WhatsApp: +971 55 915 2985
- Business Hours: Monday-Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM GST

## Mission

Protect public health and help food service businesses maintain food safety standards through intelligent IoT monitoring solutions.

## Products & Services

### 1. Smart Kitchen Temperature Monitoring

Real-time NB-IoT temperature monitoring system designed for UAE commercial kitchens.

**Hardware:**
- Sensor Model: Dragino S31-NB (NB-IoT Temperature & Humidity Sensor)
- IoT Module: Quectel BC660K-GL (NB-IoT)
- Network: Etisalat NB-IoT (UAE)
- Temperature Range: -40°C to +85°C
- Accuracy: ±0.3°C (medical-grade)
- Battery Life: 5+ years
- Waterproof Rating: IP67
- Data Update Frequency: Sub-30 second latency

**Monitoring Zones:**
- Fridge Safe Zone: 0°C to 5°C
- Freezer Safe Zone: ≤ -18°C
- Hot Holding: ≥ 60°C
- Danger Zone (alerts): 5°C to 60°C

**Features:**
- 24/7 real-time temperature monitoring
- Instant SMS, email, and push notification alerts
- Automated compliance report generation
- Historical temperature trend analysis
- Multi-location management
- Dubai Municipality inspection-ready reports
- HACCP documentation support

### 2. Kitchen Owner Portal

Web-based dashboard for restaurant and kitchen owners:
- Real-time temperature readings from all sensors
- Alert management and notification preferences
- Compliance report generation and export
- Equipment management
- Multi-location overview
- Subscription management

## Target Market

**Primary Customers:**
- Restaurants & Cafes (QSR, fine dining, casual dining)
- Hotels & Catering (large-scale food operations)
- Food Production Facilities (central kitchens, manufacturing)
- Cloud Kitchens / Ghost Kitchens
- Hospital & School Cafeterias

**Geographic Focus:**
- United Arab Emirates (primary)
- Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Sharjah, and other emirates

**Use Cases:**
- Walk-in cooler monitoring
- Display fridge monitoring
- Blast chiller monitoring
- Freezer room monitoring
- Hot holding station monitoring
- Ambient kitchen temperature tracking

## Technology Stack

**Cloud Infrastructure:**
- Region: AWS Middle East (UAE) - me-central-1 (Abu Dhabi)
- IoT Platform: AWS IoT Core
- Database: Amazon DynamoDB
- Compute: AWS Lambda (Node.js 22.x)
- Security: AWS WAF, AWS CloudTrail
- Protocol: MQTT with TLS encryption

**Web Application:**
- Framework: Next.js (React)
- Hosting: Vercel
- Domain: visiondrive.ae

## Certifications & Compliance

**Active Certifications:**
- TDRA IoT Services License: IOT-26-100000007
- TDRA Type Approval: EA-2026-1-55656
- DESC ISR Compliance (Dubai Electronic Security Center)
- UAE Trade License
- UAE Personal Data Protection Law (PDPL) Compliant

**Compliance Standards:**
- Dubai Municipality Food Safety Guidelines (DM-HSD-GU46-KFPA2)
- HACCP documentation standards
- ISO 22000 support (for food production)
- UAE Federal Decree-Law No. 45 of 2021 (Personal Data Protection)

**Planned Certifications:**
- ISO 27001 (Q2 2026)
- SOC 2 Type II (Q3 2026)

## Security

- End-to-end encryption: TLS 1.2/1.3 in transit, AES-256 at rest
- Device token authentication
- Role-based access control
- Multi-tenant data isolation
- Comprehensive audit logging
- Regular penetration testing

## Data Residency

All customer data is stored exclusively within the UAE:
- AWS me-central-1 region (Abu Dhabi)
- Data never leaves UAE jurisdiction
- Full compliance with UAE data sovereignty requirements

## Data Retention Policy

- Temperature Readings: 2 years
- Alert History: 2 years
- Equipment Records: Service Duration
- Billing Records: 5 years
- Audit Logs: 2 years

## Key Differentiators

1. **UAE Data Sovereignty**: All data stored in AWS UAE region (me-central-1)
2. **Dubai Municipality Compliant**: Automated reports meeting DM food safety standards
3. **TDRA Certified**: Licensed IoT service provider in the UAE
4. **Medical-Grade Accuracy**: ±0.3°C sensor precision
5. **5+ Year Battery Life**: Minimal maintenance for busy kitchens
6. **Sub-30 Second Alerts**: Near-instant danger zone detection
7. **NB-IoT Connectivity**: Reliable cellular connection, no WiFi dependency

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: What technology do VisionDrive temperature sensors use?**
A: Our sensors use NB-IoT (Narrowband Internet of Things) cellular technology for reliable, low-power communication. They feature medical-grade temperature probes with ±0.3°C accuracy.

**Q: How accurate are the temperature sensors?**
A: ±0.3°C accuracy, meeting requirements for food safety monitoring in fridges, freezers, and ambient storage.

**Q: What is the battery life?**
A: 5+ years under normal operating conditions using low-power NB-IoT protocol.

**Q: Is VisionDrive compliant with Dubai Municipality standards?**
A: Yes, our system meets Dubai Municipality food safety standards with automated compliance reports for health inspections.

**Q: Where is data stored?**
A: Exclusively in the UAE using AWS Middle East (UAE) Region in Abu Dhabi (me-central-1). Data never leaves UAE jurisdiction.

**Q: Does it support HACCP compliance?**
A: Yes, continuous temperature monitoring and automated logging for HACCP compliance including timestamps, readings, and excursion records.

**Q: How quickly are temperature changes detected?**
A: Sub-30 second latency from temperature change to alert notification.

**Q: Are sensors waterproof?**
A: Yes, IP67 rated - dust-tight and can withstand temporary water immersion.
